introduction: Following the illegal activities of one of the most notorious hackers in the world, the new Max Original documentary series Most Wanted: Teen Hacker is full of stunning twists and turns. The crimes of Finnish Julius Kivimäki (now 27-year-old and known as Aleksanteri Kivimäki) have been traced around the world to more than 10 years ago. Kivimäki has forced a US passenger plane to make an emergency landing, shut down PlayStation globally and orchestrated several dangerous SWAT attacks, for example to the home of an FBI agent’s family. FBI has named him as one of the most dangerous hackers in the world.
